I just want you to know, for the next year you guys can steal my belt celebration because we're the champions of the world. Put that on whenever you want, Aaron Rodgers said with a huge smile. "It's been a great journey."

Democratic Jesse Jackson Jr. Steve Cohen ( Tenn.) on the House Judiciary Committee floor Tuesday night compared Republican claims about the reform law to lies perpetrated by the Nazis that led to the Holocaust. They say it's a government takeover of healthcare. A big lie, just like Goebbels, said Steve Cohen , who is Jewish. Meanwhile, Jesse Jackson Jr. Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) said House Judiciary Committee Republicans will vote to repeal the healthcare law "lock, stock and barrel." Another day,

Simon Cowell has made his mark "by going against the grain and having the courage to say exactly what is on his mind." "I'm not a master of anything," says Simon Cowell . I think what I'm good at is making shows or records which a lot of people will like for the same reasons I like them. He says he truly trusts his own instincts and when evaluating talent, doesn't necessarily think of himself as a person running a record company or in charge of a TV show. "
